comment.author: 26523625@N07
comment._content: Think this is Durban not Nigeria as in the map. ND was number plate for Durban N = Natal D+Durban

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content:
Yes, quite a serious mapping blip there!

Anyone recognise the street containing "Ansteys"? Looks like quite a prominent department store.

comment.author: 41668727@N05
comment._content: That was taken in West Street looking up to the Berea in the distance. The building a few to the left of Anstey's is the Colonial & Mutual building. The Anstey's building is still there, it is was for many years a ladies fashion store called Millady's. Not sure what is there now. Across the road would have been Stuttafords and Greatermans.

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: Brilliant. Thank you very much for this.
